column3: I was gonna keep it real like chill like only have a drink or two
column4: But it turned into a party when I started talking to you
column5: Now you're standing in the neon looking like a high I wanna be on
column6: Baby it's your call,, no pressure at all
column9: You dont have to throw back your pretty pink lemonade shooter and lean a little closer
column10: You dont have to keep on smiling that smile thats driving me wild and when the night is almost over
column11: Meet me in the middle of a moonlit Chevy bench seat and do a little bit of country song,, hanging on
column12: You dont have to keep me fallin like this
column13: But itd sure be cool if you did
column16: You cant shoot me down cause you already knocked me dead
column17: Got me falling apart with my heart talking out of my head
column18: Let your mind take a little back road
column19: Just as far as you wanna go
column20: Baby Ill do whatever you wanna do
column25: Have a night that you'll never forget
column26: And now you're standing in the neon
column27: Looking like a high I wanna be on
